thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Oil Prices Stabilize After Volatility

author: Sarah McFarlane
title: Oil Prices Stabilize After Volatility
text:
Oil prices were little changed on Wednesday, stabilizing after Brent crude hit its lowest level this year, swept up in the volatility which has rocked global stock markets this week.
Brent crude, the global oil benchmark, rose 0.1% to $66.93 a barrel on Londonâ€™s ICE Futures exchange. On the New York Mercantile Exchange, West Texas Intermediate futures were trading down 0.1% at $63.35 a barrel.
Oil...
